data_table.description: Hachinski Ischemic Scale, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HIS1
variable.description: Q1. Hachinski abrupt onset (cognitive status) [Hachinski Ischemic Scale]

variable.name: HIS2
variable.description: Q2. Hachinski stepwise deterioration (cognitive status) [Hachinski Ischemic Scale]

variable.name: HIS3
variable.description: Q3. Hachinski history of stroke [Hachinski Ischemic Scale]

variable.name: HIS4
variable.description: Q4. Hachinski focal neurological symptoms [Hachinski Ischemic Scale]

variable.name: HIS5
variable.description: Q5. Hachinski focal neurological signs [Hachinski Ischemic Scale]

variable.name: HIS6
variable.description: Q6. Hachinski Sum Of Scores [Hachinski Ischemic Scale]

variable.name: HIS0AY
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q0a. Year Of Completion Date [Hachinski Ischemic Scale]
